member.name: P:Stone.WinUI.AsGridView.RowFilter
member.summary:
Get or set the conditon string to filter which rows are viewed.
Example below:
Date/Time : DueDate = #12/31/2008#, RegisterDate = #12/31/2008 21:30:55#
String : City = 'Bangkok', City Like '%kok%', City In('Bangkok', 'Newyork')
Number : Amount >= 250
Aggregate: Sum(Child.Price) > 500 ,Select orders which total price (sum of items prices) is greater or equal $500
Function: Convert, Len, IsNull, IIF, Trim, SubString

example.code:
'DateTime DueDate = #12/31/2008# RegisterDate = #12/31/2008 21:30:55#
'string City = 'Bangkok' City Like '%kok%' City In('Bangkok', 'Newyork')
'Number Amount >= 250
'Aggregte, Select orders which total price (sum of items prices) is greater or equal $500 Sum(Child.Price) > 500
'Function Convert, Len, IsNull, IIF, Trim, SubString

member.summary: Process an EndElement node type as defined by .

member.name: M:Stone.WinUI.Markup.MarkupText.Render(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Windows.Forms.Padding,System.String,System.Drawing.Font,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Boolean)
member.param: if set to true [draw with cache].
member.remarks:
Dummy <html> root tags are added to to satisfy the class.
An is used to build the property of the object.
The only XML node types we are interested in are that represent the HTML start tag, that represent the end tag and that represents the text.
A object is used to parse the HTML document tree, the stack can only contain objects, which contain sufficent information to render the part of the tree.
The IMG tag is different from the rest as it is an empty tag (no end tag), so the stack processing needs to be different.

member.name: M:Stone.WinUI.Markup.MarkupText.BuildElement(System.Xml.XmlTextReader,System.Collections.Stack)
member.summary: Process an Element node type defined by .
member.param: The used to process the Element node.
The used in parsing the HTML.
member.returns: Returns the that was processed.
member.remarks: Only a few attributes are processed but we attempt to maintain all attributes to be returned in the property, refer to the default case in the switch statement. All branches that are not processed by lower methods end up in the default case.

member.name: M:Stone.WinUI.Markup.MarkupText.BuildElementAnchor(System.Xml.XmlTextReader,System.Collections.Stack,Stone.WinUI.Markup.StackItem)
member.param: The used to process the Element node.
The used in parsing the HTML.
The that is at the top of the stack.
member.exception: Thrown when an attempt is made to nest anchor <A> tags is detected.
member.remarks: A is added to the stack regardless of whether the link is correctly defined to simplify removing items from the stack when we get to the tag.
